channel.title: Where can I change the Drops
channel.description: Hello everyone I need to know where I may change the drops. By drops I mean the items that EVERY NPC drops, NOT Npcdrops.tsm. By this I mean herbs, clue scrolls, and charms. Thanks in advance

item.title: Where can I change the Drops
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

NPCHandler.java in the dropItem method under:

For every npc to drop it, start off by using this:

[code]if(npcs[i].npcType > 0) {

}[/code]
^ This simply means that every npc will drop whatever you put in there.

You can also base your drops off this:

if(npcs[i].npcType > 0) { int random2 = Misc.random(8); if(random2 == 4) { Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 12158, npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 1, c.playerId); } if(random2 == 3) { Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 12159, npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 1, c.playerId); } if(random2 == 2) { Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 12160, npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 1, c.playerId); } if(random2 == 1) { Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 12163, npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 1, c.playerId); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Where can I change the Drops
